title: Specious 2 bed and 2 Bath
posting_body: Metro 77 & 85 is located minutes from downtown San Leandro and nestled in an established residential community
, We offer efficiency, 1 & 2 bedroom apartment homes.
Our community has been recently renovated with unique features such as contemporary white cabinetry throughout, quartz countertops, stainless steel appliances and plush plank flooring.
Call or stop by for your personal tour today!
